column4: Once Ubuntu 10.04LTS reaches its end of life (Apr 2013) does it become unsafe to use immediately? 3-6 months later? 6-12 monts later? or much later?
ubuntu isn't like debian - there isn't an old-stable grace year.  When it's EOL, no more updates.
does ubuntu 10.04LTS become unsafe to use immediately pass its EOL?
